original_text: Do ye not know that the saints shall judge the world? and if the world shall be judged by you, are ye unworthy to judge the smallest matters?
korean_text: 성도가 세상을 판단할 것을 너희가 알지 못하느냐 세상도 너희에게 판단을 받겠거든 지극히 작은 일 판단하기를 감당하지 못하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: that the saints shall judge the world?
and if the world shall be judged by you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 세상이 너희에게 심판을 받을 것이라면,
